title: Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, "Tightrope: Americans Reaching for Hope"
description:
Pulitzer Prize-winning journalists Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn reported on the issues facing the working-class in rural America. They were interviewed by Sen. Jeff Merkley, Democrat of Oregon. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
